The id to this application is "SYSTEM" and it contains the transaction codes which is to be used while raising STMT.ENTRY for various DD events.

The Transaction code given for NEW.ITEM.DR /NEW.ITEM.CR is used while generating Forward Statement entries from DD.STANDALONE application. Other transaction codes are used when an Outward ITEM is returned, resubmitted and during claim accounting process for all DD.ITEMs.
The transaction code given here is applicable for all clearing system.
Valid value allowed "SYSTEM"
